thread.title: Blast reported near Supreme Court in Kabul
thread.title_full: Blast reported near Supreme Court in Kabul

title: Blast reported near Supreme Court in Kabul
text: Donald & Melania Trump at Super Bowl party Blast reported near Supreme Court in Afghan capital An explosion occurred near the Supreme Court in the centre of Afghanistan's capital, Kabul, on Tuesday, according to witnesses at a nearby government ministry. Kabul police confirmed that a blast had been heard and they were still working to identify the exact location of it. Reuters | Updated: Feb 7, 2017, 05.28 PM IST File photo of Afghanistan's Supreme Court building. (Courtesy: supremecourt.gov.af) KABUL: An explosion occurred near the Supreme Court in the centre of Afghanistan 's capital, Kabul , on Tuesday, according to witnesses at a nearby government ministry. Kabul police confirmed that a blast had been heard and they were still working to identify the exact location of it. #Kabul - The explosion was a suicide bombing that occurred in the car park of the Supreme Court. Sources say 12 people were killed & wounded â€” TOLOnews (@TOLOnews) February 7, 2017 More details are awaited.
